member.name: T:DotSpatial.Plugins.ToolManager.ToolManagerPlugin
member.summary: The Toolmanager plugin is used to load the ToolManager from the Controls project into the Tools tab.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Plugins.ToolManager.ToolManagerPlugin.Tools

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.ToolManager.ToolManagerPlugin.OnImportsSatisfied
